title: Roasted Sweet Pepper Soup with Optional Chicken Basil Sausage

instructions.Frozen Pint: Defrost or run jar under warm water and slide out. Heat gently in a saucepan, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint / VEGAN: Defrost or run jar under warm water and slide out. Heat gently in a saucepan, stirring.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Sausage: Defrost or run jar under warm water and slide out. Heat gently in a saucepan, stirring.
